channel.title: [PI] restrictions for admins
channel.description:
how to restrict trading, attacking by other players, dueling other players in the duel arena, and assist them. when someone tries to do one of those it says:
Sorry, but Staff Mods are protected from your attacks. Sorry, but you can't trade with Staff Mods. Staff Mods cannot use the Assist System to help you. Staff Mods cannot duel you.
